tool.title: cloud
tool.about:
Example of a Rappture <cloud> object.
Clouds are a collection of mesh points over which a <field> is defined.
WARNING: The cloud output is deprecated in favor of the unstructured mesh type -- please see the <mesh> example.
When you click the Simulate button, the inputs will be used to generate output clouds.
